11.content: Has Renton always been fat?
11.title: Renton Thurston

choices: No reason she can't enjoy a good meal too
1133.content: Has Hilda been getting fat too?
1133.title: Hilda

choices: Eureka's not as into food as Renton is
Eureka and Renton love eating together
11331.content: Has she been fattening up Eureka too?
11331.title: She's focused on stuffing Renton

113312.content: When did their bellies start swelling up?
113312.title: Eureka and Renton love eating together

choices: Hilda gives them some alone time
Hilda keeps tending to their bellies
Hilda gets hungry and starts pigging out
1133122.content:
Two loud, satisfied belches sounded from Renton's room on the Gekko.

"UUUURRRP! Ah, that was good." Eureka moaned she rubbed her belly.

"UUURRRRP! You said it, I'm stuffed." Renton moaned as he gave his belly a slap, causing it to jiggle like it was made of jello.

The two fatties were leaning back in their couch. Renton's belt had been snapped in half by his gut, which had also popped off the button on his pants and forced the zipper all the way down, exposing a bit of his underwear to Eureka and Hilda. His hoodie and the shirt under it had rode up his dome of a middle to the point that it only covered his moobs, leaving his belly completely exposed. Eureka's tummy was also fully exposed, due to it having popped off all the buttons on her dress that kept it together around her abdominal region.

"Heh, you two never get tired of my cooking." Hilda said as she reached out and started rubbing the duo's bellies.

There was certainly a lot to rub, as their bellies were huge. Not just from how much they had eaten today, but also from how much they had been eating this entire month. Renton now weighed 212 pounds and Eureka weighed 209 pounds. Most of Renton's weight had gone to his belly while Eureka's had spread evenly.

Renton's belly was a giant orb of soft jiggly fat. It was the size of a big beanbag chair and just as comfy if not more so. It would jiggle and bounce with every step the fat brunette made, emphasizing just how fat Renton now was. It embarrassed Renton while Eureka thought the jiggling was cute. The effects of gravity had taken hold of the sphere of adipose, causing it to hang down. His bellybutton had gotten much deeper as the pounds were packed on, now almost looking like a dark cavern in the center of his tummy. The incredible softness of Renton's belly made it a very nice plaything for Eureka, she loved rubbing, jiggling, shaking, and kneading it. As well as a wonderful pillow for her to rest her head on while taking a nap after a big meal.

Renton's chest was now a pair of flabby moobs. The sacks of fat rested on his tummy, using it as a makeshift shelf. They were just as jiggly as their support, which embarrassed Renton to no end. The sacks of fat were big enough to fill up a C cup bra. Were one just looking at Renton's chest and nothing else, it wouldn't be unreasonable to mistake them for actual breasts. When Eureka saw that Renton was embarrassed over how his moobs were bouncing, she awkwardly tried to cheer him up by telling him that they now have something else in common besides being fat. It worked, not because that made him feel better about his man boobs, but because of how charming Eureka was being in a dorky way.

The Nirvash pilot has a huge butt with absolutely no tone or definition. Each cheek was like a volleyball of soft flab that bobbed and bounced with every step the overfed brunette made. His ass completely filled up any normal sized chair he plopped down in. Sitting on a couch would now leave a notable imprint on it. Renton's butt was responsible for a rather embarrassing incident. Eureka had dropped a part while doing maintenance on the Nirvash, and of course Renton offered to get it for her However, when he leaned over, his pants ripped, exposing his underwear to a blushing Eureka. He was eternally grateful to Hilda for getting him bigger versions of his clothes.

His legs were just as chubby as his butt, being meaty and wide. They rubbed together when he sat down and jostled when he walked. His legs and his ass made his pilot seat in the Nirvash uncomfortably snug and way too small for him, which actually affected his performance. Thankfully it was quickly resized when the Gekkostate realized getting a bigger chair was a matter of practicality.

Renton's face was very chubby. So chubby it pretty much had no angles, being completely pie-like in shape. His cheeks were pretty much puffed up, making him look like he was always holding his breath. It went along well with his big double chin. These features made Renton's face more precious and adorable, especially during his moments of enthusiasm when he was geeking out and fanboying over something. His blushing also made extra adorable by his weight gain. Eureka absolutely loved how soft Renton's face, sometimes she would pinch or cup it in her hands. Renton never thought he would be happy to hear someone say his face resembles a puppy's, but he was very happy when Eureka told him that.

Eureka's belly was a large ball of fat that had popped many buttons. It pillowy in texture and give, Eureka had spent a lot of time playing with her belly. Patting it, poking it, kneading it, jiggling it, shaking it, she loved it all. Sometimes she would lift her belly up and then drop it, watching how it jiggled with wide-eyed wonder and amazement. Plentiful rolls and love handles accompanied the sides of stomach, deep enough that she sometimes fit some mechanical parts in them while she was working on the Nirvash. A fun yet practical method. The Nirvash pilot loved bumping bellies with Renton, something that often caused them to burp in unison, especially after a big meal. One time she accidentally belly bumped Renton so hard he was knocked onto his back, prompting laughter from both of them.

The Nirvash pilot now had big boobs thanks to her binging. They were now even a bit bigger then Talho's boobs, much to Talho's envy though Eureka didn't really understand why Talho seemed frustrated when she looked at the pilot's chest. Eureka now knew what it felt like to have your chest bounce. Her chest would get especially bouncy when she was piloting the Nirvash, sometimes even coming up into her view for a split second. That could be a bit distracting though it never actually got in the way of piloting. While Renton and Eureka had both noticed that the latter's breasts were getting bigger, they didn't realize how truly big they were getting until her boobs literally broke her swimsuit top during a trip to the beach. Right in front of Renton.

Her ass was huge, each cheek being the size of a basketball. While Renton's butt would fill up every normal sized he sat in, Eureka's backside filled it up and then some, with flab spilling off the sides. It had even broken some chairs. One recent notable instance of that was right after Eureka and Renton had finished another huge meal that left them bloated with their guts hanging out completely exposed. They leaned back in their chairs with their hands on their big bellies and belched loudly in satisfaction, as they traditionally did. However, there was a creaking sound right before Eureka's chair broke, her entire body jiggling when she hit the ground. Renton was very concerned but before he could help her up, his chair broke as well. The love birds then just laughed and rubbed each other's tums.

Eureka's legs were very wide and thick with fat. They constantly rubbed together, and were both dimply and jiggly. The jiggling was actually something that interested Eureka. Like with Renton, her butt and legs meant a new Nirvash chair had to be bought. Her's was actually wider then Renton's, as it was obvious to everyone that she had gained more in her lower body.

Eureka had an adorably round face, with chubby cheeks and a double chin. Whenever she smiled, dimples would appear on her cheeks. Combined with how round her face was, this made her smiles even more heartwarming. Her cheeks would even jiggle when she let out a bellyful laugh or really massive belch. Renton always thought Eureka was as cute as can be, so he was completely shocked when it turned out that she had gotten even cutter. one time when they had just finished a really big bowl of ice cream and were leaning back in their chairs. Seeing her smile with chubby cheeks that had bits of ice cream on them as she bumped her jiggly belly with Renton's was so cute Renton wasn't even sure how he could describe it.

Hilda was the reason Renton and Eureka had completely blown up with fat. She knew (along with every other member of the Gekkostate) that Renton and Eureka had feelings for each other but were too shy and inexperienced in romance to confess. To rectify this, she prepared meals for them to eat together, tithe by cooking it or simply fetching junk food for them. She made sure these meals were extra large so that the duo spent as much time together as possible. Constantly overfeeding them had them both ballooned up in no time but Hilda felt they actually looked really adorable as total butterballs. Well, more adorable then usual.

Hilda soothingly rubbed the lovebirds' overfed bellies, feeling how taut yet soft they were at the same time. It really was like feeling up a beanbag chair. Renton and Eureka moaned and burped as the massage filled them with a wonderful warmth.

"Ahhh, UUURRRAP! We never get tired of your belly -URRP- rubs either." Renton said.

Eureka nodded in agreement, the motion making her double chin appear even bigger, and then burped again.

The soothing circles her hands made over their spheres of adipose eased the bubbling digestion going on inside, leaving not a single bit of even slight discomfort. this also stirred up the gas as well, causing the Nirvash pilots to burp the entire time, the burps getting bigger and louder as time passed. Hilda would compliment them when they let out a really large belch, sometimes with a few friendly pats to the belly of the belcher, which could elicit yet another burp sometimes.
1133122.title: Synchronized when Piloting and when Eating

choices: Renton and Eureka raise money for the Gekkostate by entering an eating contest
Renton and Eureka's bellies get in the way of piloting
11331221.content:
The dark skinned women didn't just rub their bellies, she also engaged in plenty of belly play. Such as the balls of fat, and then seeing how they jiggled slightly from the impact. She'd knead their flabby middles, getting as much belly fat as she could in her hands, it was almost like kneading cookie dough. She'd give their bellies a good shake, either by grabbing the sides of it or just with one handful of creamy flab. She would give either tummy a good slap, making it jiggle in a gelatinous fashion. Sometimes she'd drum or tap her fingers on the bellies, around the area where their navel was, which felt surprisingly soothing to the fatasses. If either the brunette or the greenette had some gas that was stuck, she'd either press down on their gut or poke them in their incredibly deep bellybutton, the latter method requiring she stick her whole finger in to reach the end, to force a big burp out. A big burp that was always followed by a sign of relief. Sometimes she'd stick her finger into either fatty's bellybutton as deeply as she could, then shake her finger, causing the giant fatty orb to jiggle and wobble wildly.

"Sorry to cut this early but I've got to go back to work now." Hilda gave the chubsters' bellies a few affectionate pats before she removed her hands from the bellies. The reason Hilda gave for having to leave was a lie, Hilda did all her work today early so she'd have plenty of time for Renton and Eureka. The real reason she left was so that the Nirvash pilots would some alone time.

"That's alright, you already spent plenty -UUUURP- of time on us." Eureka said.

Renton stretched and yawned. "Besides, I'm about to fall into a food coma anyways. UURRRAAP!" Saying that reminded Renton of the first time he used that term in front of Eureka. He had to clam her down by clarifying that he wasn't going to fall into a literal coma.

"I'm feeling a bit tired too." Eureka said.

"I think you two are awake enough to give each other a good belly rub like always. Anyways, I'll see you later" Hilda teased as she left.

Eureka and Renton blushed.

"Is it that obvious we always do that?" Eureka asked.

"I-I think there might've been one or two time were we got caught up in the moment and forgot other people were there." Renton scratched the back of his head in an embarrassed manner.

A few seconds of silence occurred as both teens thought back on memories of them being touchy feely with each other that they now had a feeling might've been in front of the other Gekkostate members. Or worse, in public. The silence was soon broken when the two burped at nearly the exact same time, Renton's burp happened slightly sooner. This was followed up some laughing, and that was followed up by the brunette and greenette giving each other a nice belly rub.

It felt amazing for each teen to bring their hand over the other's big belly. Even when they were stuffed to the brim there was still a layer of soft fat. The experience gave them both goosebumps. They loved playing with the other's belly, doing things like patting it, shaking it, and jiggling it. They even played with each other's bellybutton a bit. At one point Eureka lifted up Renton's belly and then dropped it, resulting in lots of jiggling. The two giggled at this. Renton then did the same to Eureka's stomach, which jiggled just as much. Once again they giggled.

The teens let out some of the loudest belches of their lives, some powerful enough to send vibration through the air and jiggle their bellies. Every time one glutton praised the other's belching skills, their face lit up in joy. They did a few short belching contests. Renton had won three, while Eureka had won four.

Renton let out a loud burp that made his belly jiggle. "Hey, Eureka.... Do you think I've gotten too fat?"

Eureka swallowed down a belch so she could answer her friend's question. "No, not at all."

"R-Really?"

The green haired girl thumped her chest to belch. "Yes, really. Do you hate being overweight?"

"Well, I haven't really thought that about that. I mean, I have, but well...."

Eureka tilted her head quizzically.

"I know a lot of girls aren't into guys with huge stomachs and boobs, so I was worried you wouldn't like my new look. So, uh, just so I know exactly how you feel, can you tell me what you think of my stomach?" Renton puffed out his stomach to make sure Eureka had a good view of it.

"Okay, I like it."

Renton let out a huge sigh in relief. "Phew, thanks for clearing that up, I was really worried."

"Do you like being fat too?"

"I don't know.... But what I do know, is that I like eating with you and I like your belly." Renton grabbed the sides of his belly and gave it a shake for emphasis. "And if putting on a few hundred pounds is the price I have to pay for that, then bring on the pies!"

Eureka giggled at how much of a charming dork Renton was being. "I think this calls for a belly bump." She said as she positioned herself for said bump.

"It sure does." Renton got in the same position.

The fat Nirvash pilots bumped their big bellies together, the impact making them jiggle intensely. This made burp the loudest they ever had yet, so loudly the room itself shook.

"UUUUUUURRRRRRAAAAP!"

It was like it was a burp powered by true love.
11331221.title: Belly Bonding

info.description:
The following was written by Jake Featherston.

Well, it took a good 13 years, but I finally decided to make a WG interactive for my favourite anime of all time-- Eureka Seven! Rules here are about the same as my PokÃ©mon one; male and female gain are both welcome, height growth can be permitted if the storyline makes sense, do your best to keep canon characterisation intact (eg., don't have good characters suddenly turn evil, introverted ones suddenly act like valley girls, etc.), have SOME semblance of plot outside of just fattening/sex, and NO one-liners or endless chains of choice chapters.

Poor grammar will be corrected (within reason at least), and there's no restrictions on sexual content, regardless of the ages of those characters involved. I'm hoping the remaining fandom for this awesome, yet underappreciated mecha romance adventure will come out and contribute whatever ideas they've got for cute, flabby, sexy fun!
